name: Game of Thrones House Name Generator
description: Craft a noble and formidable name worthy of the Iron Throne! Our generator will forge a House name that resonates with the power, intrigue, and epic scale of Westeros. Prepare to stake your claim!
introduction: Winter is coming... and so is the perfect name for your Game of Thrones House! Tired of the same old 'Stark' and 'Lannister'? Want a name that screams power, history, and maybe just a *little* bit of madness? You've come to the right place. This generator will spin you a name so epic, George R.R. Martin himself might steal it for his next book (no promises, though!).
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. Like, seriously, just mash it. That's the magic right there.
Keep clicking! The more you generate, the higher the chance of finding *the one*. (Think of it like searching for the Holy Grail, but with less Templars and more dragons.)
Found a name you love? Awesome! Now go write a 10-book series about your House's rise to power (and inevitable tragic downfall).
If you're *really* feeling adventurous, combine elements from multiple generated names. 'House Ironwood of the Shadowfell' has a certain ring to it, doesn't it?

faqs.question: Will this generator guarantee me a seat on the Iron Throne?
faqs.answer: Sadly, no. This generator is for names only. You'll need to handle the political maneuvering, backstabbing, and dragon-riding yourself. We recommend starting with a strong army and a cunning advisor.

faqs.question: Are these names canon?
faqs.answer: Nope! These are original creations designed to capture the *spirit* of Game of Thrones. Think of them as fan-fiction names, but way cooler.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for my D&D campaign?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! These names are perfect for any fantasy setting. Just be prepared for your players to start speaking in faux-medieval accents.

faqs.question: Is this generator powered by magic?
faqs.answer: Maybe. We're not telling. But we *did* sacrifice a rubber chicken to the algorithm to ensure maximum awesomeness.

faqs.question: What if I don't like any of the generated names?
faqs.answer: Keep generating! Or, get creative and tweak them to your liking. After all, you're the Lord or Lady of your House now. You make the rules!

faqs.question: Will using a name from this generator summon a White Walker invasion?
faqs.answer: Highly unlikely. But just in case, stock up on dragonglass and Valyrian steel. Better safe than sorry, right?
